text: 11.27: Mt 28.18 naŋga, Jo 1.18 naŋga, 3.35 naŋga, 10.15 naŋga, 17.2 naŋga, Fl 2.9Kamavata Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Muhɨmɨmuhɨm Yavandak yandɨ kumañɨ tamami. Kru mumɨŋga ndahara Ñɨŋi hamaŋ maŋgandi. Nɨŋuva nuŋambi ŋgandi. Naŋga, kru mumɨŋga Nɨŋuvaŋ maŋgandi. Ñɨŋi hama nuŋambi ŋgandi. Naŋga kru Nɨŋuvaŋ isɨhuramahi ŋgandu haŋɨnɨŋ ndaya Nɨŋuvaŋ ŋgandu.
